query:
SELECT m.*, 
  s.name as sender_name, s.role as sender_role, s.phoneNumber as sender_phone,
  r.name as recipient_name, r.role as recipient_role, r.phoneNumber as recipient_phone
FROM messages m
LEFT JOIN users s ON m.sender_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN users r ON m.recipient_id = r.id
ORDER BY m.created_at DESC
LIMIT 20
